title: Every day when I wake up, why is there always a song playing in my head? - Quora

response.answer_text: Songs that appear in your mind, and play over and over and over should be understood as intuitive knowledge. The song happens to you. With this song comes a message to you. Look at the lyrics of the song. What is the song saying to you? Songs, music, represents emotions and feelings. Emotions and feelings can be intuitive knowledge. Pay attention to what comes to you uninvited. Best wishes.
Is it a random song? Or a particular song. If it is the latter, you, my friend, have what is dubbed as an “earworm”
